body.p:
My name is Kabir Narula and I live in Toronto, Canada. I am a web developer interested in building applications. I am looking for my first job as a web developer, since I was a child I have been in contact with computers and I have not stopped learning. 

 So far, my skills are: 

 HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, C, C++, GraphQL, React, Git.
